Add some colors and rainbows the in-game HUD!

## Features
This highly configurable mod allows you to adjust the colors of:
* The Multiplier Ring:
  * Unique colors for every multiplier stage
  * Smoothly transition between multiplier stages
  * Rainbow animation on full (8x) multiplier
* The Energy Bar
  * Low, center, and high energy colors that smoothly fade depending on your current energy
  * Rainbow animation on full energy
  * Proper support for one-line and 4-life gameplay modes
* The "FC" Lines of the Combo Panel
  * Lines can either be solid colors or gradient between two different colors
  * Bottom line can reflect the top line for a more unique effect
* The Progress Bar
  * Options to color the fill, background, and handle components individually
  * Alternate rendering mode to transition between two colors as the song progresses
* The Rank Panel Lettering
  * Unique coloring for every possible rank
  * Rainbow animation on SS rank
  * *Compatible with Counters+*
* The Position Panel (Multiplayer Exclusive)
  * Unique colors corresponding to your current rank in the lobby
  * Rainbow animation in first place
  * Disable first place animation

Additionally, this mod comes with a built-in settings previewer that lets you see what your options will look like in real-time, right in the menu scene. These options are seamlessly reflected to the game scene!
